text.section:
The Department may approve an application for a project only if the political subdivision in which the project is to be situated has:
approved the project; and
contributed to reducing the development costs or operating costs; or
otherwise supported the project.

In reviewing an application for a Program loan, the Department shall consider:
the economic feasibility of the project;
the contribution of the political subdivision for the project in relation to the ability of the political subdivision to contribute; and
other relevant factors.
